alert.note: Alert for City of Roanoke; City of Salem; Roanoke (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 10:13PM EST until January 10 at 9:08PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia... Roanoke (Staunton) River At Brookneal affecting Charlotte, Campbell and Halifax Counties. Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and Halifax Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Roanoke River At Roanoke affecting City of Roanoke, Roanoke and City of Salem. For the Roanoke River...including Roanoke, Altavista, Brookneal, Randolph...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Roanoke River at Roanoke. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.5 feet, Flooding occurs in portions of Wasena Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:50 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 4.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 10.5 feet. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1015 AM EST.

area.areaDesc: City of Roanoke; City of Salem; Roanoke
